system.description:
With the intensity of metal riffing, the Noise Thrasher is able to put a target to their boiling point and tips them over the edge. A target within a 40 ft radius of the Noise Thrasher must make a [[/save resolve]] or gain the @UUID[Compendium.neon-lords.journal.JournalEntry.Ej0fIoR2umnEbLfo.JournalEntryPage.iHjm9GxHYgA4lg9s]{Bloodlust} condition for [[/roll 1D4]]+Noise Thrasher level turns.

Metal Health Will Drive You Mad: The Noise Thrasher can expend additional Riff Points to target more creatures.
